title: Hometown: The Puget Sound Kids of the 1990s
description: In the 1990s, a troubled young man growing up in the Pacific Northwest and outlying points of Seattle, WA struggles to find out who he is and as a result, suffers many predicaments in his life. He endures quite the self inflicted struggle through poor decision-making with consideration to his choice of friends, in this coming of age story.
author: Ian Primmer
